name: rpietro.github.io
body:
# divein coaching

Welcome to the divein coaching blog, where posts focus on big data and situated cognition applied to immersive distance learning.

How do they come together? Here are some examples:

* Big data applied to learning 
    * Market research surveys to determine skills gaps and learning opportunities
    * Experiments to test the best learning and immersive approaches
    * Psychometrics using large educational data sets
    * ...

* Situated cognitive learning
    * Immersive environments in distance education
    * Instructional design models
    * UX (User eXperience) in learning management systems
    * ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
